alert.note: Alert for Eastern Windham (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 12 at 3:46AM EST until March 12 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM THIS MORNING TO 10 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulation of 4 to 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...In Vermont, Eastern Windham County. * WHEN...From 7 AM this morning until 10 PM EST tonight. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions due to snow covered roads. Gusty winds will contribute to blowing and drifting of snowfall. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates may reach one inch per hour late this morning and this afternoon.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
